channel.title: device on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in device on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Spotify Car Thing is a $90 thing that plays Spotify in your car (2 minute read) Spotify has released its Car Thing dashboard smart music player.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-26
item.description: Google abandons FLoC, introduces Topics API to replace tracking cookies (3 minute read) Topics is Google’s new method of showing advertisers which ads to serve to users.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-24
item.description: Huawei enters China’s electric car race in competition with Tesla (3 minute read) Huawei recently released details on a vehicle with specs it claims beats Tesla’s Model Y.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-29
item.description: Apple still working on multi-device charger, a future where all devices ‘can charge each other’ (2 minute read) Apple is working on a multi-device charger for its products as well as short and long-distance wireless charging.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-07
item.description: Amazon is reportedly planning to release an Amazon-branded TV as soon as October (1 minute read) Amazon is planning to release Amazon-branded TVs as soon as October in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-06
item.description: Andy Jassy officially takes over as Amazon CEO from Jeff Bezos (3 minute read) Jeff Bezos has stepped down as CEO of Amazon and is now the Executive Chair.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-19
item.description: Facebook’s upcoming AR wrist controllers will hijack your nerves (6 minute read) Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) has unveiled a wrist-mounted controller that reads neural impulses as they travel down the arm, translating them into commands.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-26
item.description: Tesla partners with Samsung on new 5nm chip for full self-driving, report says (2 minute read) A report from Korea says that Tesla is partnering with Samsung to develop a 5-nanometer chip for self-driving.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-19
item.description: Nokia wins NASA contract to put a 4G network on the moon (1 minute read) Nokia has been awarded a $14.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-31
item.description: Elon Musk shows Neuralink brain implant working in a pig (6 minute read) On Friday night, Elon Musk unveiled Gertrude, a pig with Neuralink’s wireless device surgically implanted in its skull.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-10
item.description: Amazon reportedly considering mall space for fulfillment centers (1 minute read) Amazon and Simon Property Group have discussed the possibility of converting the Group’s mall spaces into fulfillment centers.
